mapper.select: SELECT no,goods_poster as poster,goods_name as name,goods_price as price,rownum FROM (SELECT no,goods_poster,goods_name,goods_price FROM ${table_name} ORDER BY no ASC) WHERE rownum<=3

SELECT no,goods_poster as poster,goods_name as name,goods_price as price,num FROM (SELECT no,goods_poster,goods_name,goods_price,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,goods_poster,goods_name,goods_price FROM ${table_name} ORDER BY no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
